TI: [Function imaging of the hippocampus in Korsakoff's syndrome].
AB: A case of alcoholic Korsakoff syndrome is reported in a 47 year-old-man. Neuropsychological examination revealed an important both anterograd and retrograd amnesia but procedural and short-term memory were not affected nor was intellectual capacity. Cerebral IRM was normal. Pet scan demonstrated a previously unsuspected fact: the diminution of glucose metabolism in the two hippocampus and in the mamillary bodies.
AD: L'Academie nationale de medecine, Universite de Caen (Service de Neurologie du CHU) et Unite 320 de l'INSERM.
TT: Imagerie fonctionnelle des hippocampes dans le syndrome de Korsakoff.
JT: Bulletin de l'Academie nationale de medecine
